events.venue: Main Auditorium, Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering (Autonomous)
events.description: The inauguration of AsCI marked the beginning of a new era of innovation and collaboration. The event introduced the club’s vision, featured inspiring speeches, and concluded with an exciting Tech Quiz that encouraged students to showcase their technical knowledge and enthusiasm for learning.

events.venue: Main Auditorium, Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering (Autonomous)
events.description: LOLgorithms was a unique meme-making contest where students used humor to explain technical concepts related to algorithms and computer science. This event allowed participants to blend creativity with technical knowledge, making learning fun and engaging.

events.venue: Main Auditorium, Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering (Autonomous)
events.description: Mindware was an engaging online quiz contest that tested participants' knowledge of computer science and technology. The quiz featured a variety of topics ranging from coding languages to the latest technological trends.

events.venue: Mini Auditorium, Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering (Autonomous)
events.description: Cyber Hive was an interactive seminar focused on cybersecurity awareness, scam prevention, and career opportunities in cybersecurity and networking. It featured live demonstrations of security threats and best practices for digital safety.

events.venue: MIC Lab, Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering (Autonomous)
list_of_activities: Coding Contest for 2nd and 3rd Year Students
events.description: Output Unveiled was an intense coding contest where participants solved 16 programming challenges in C and C++, unlocking each level with the output of the previous question. It tested logical thinking, debugging, and problem-solving skills.

events.venue: MIC Lab, Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering (Autonomous)
events.description: PyMind was an engaging Python-based quiz competition for first-year students. Covering basic to advanced Python topics, the quiz provided a competitive yet supportive environment to test and enhance programming skills.

events.venue: Online, Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering (Autonomous)
events.description: Crypto Countdown was a two-day online seminar covering blockchain fundamentals, decentralized finance (DeFi), smart contracts, and the future of Web3. Industry experts provided insights into blockchain's impact on business and security.

events.event_name: GET GIT GO – Master Version Control
events.venue: LAB, Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering (Autonomous)
events.description: A structured, practical workshop on Git and GitHub, including real-world applications and best practices.

list_of_activities: Timed Coding Competition with Algorithmic Challenges
events.description: A timed coding competition with algorithmic challenges to test participants' problem-solving skills and coding speed.

events.event_name: Skill Over Knowledge – Thriving in the AI Era
events.venue: Main Auditorium, Gayatri Vidya Parishad College of Engineering (Autonomous)
list_of_activities: An interactive session about the upcoming AI world
events.description: The event highlighted the growing importance of hands-on skills over theoretical knowledge in today’s education system.

events.description: A hands-on workshop aimed at introducing 1st and 2nd-year students to the fundamentals of Android development.
